content:
Downtown! That's a bit vague, as many cities have a downtown area. Could you please specify the city or state where your office is located? That way, I can give you more tailored coffee shop recommendations.

For example, are you in New York City, San Francisco, Chicago, or somewhere else?

(And by the way, I'll be here when you're ready to discuss coffee shops. We can put the train pass calculation on the back burner for now.)
